message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed session: PSU banks and defence outperformed, IT faced profit-taking (notably KPITTECH). Renewables diverged (WAAREEENER strong, KPIGREEN muted). Breadth neutral-to-slightly positive; volumes elevated in IDEA, ASHOKLEY, HINDCOPPER. Our portfolio closed at ₹25,657.30; no trades executed.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Momentum long bias; breakout watch >336.5", "reason": "Strong close with high volume; metals bid; clearing day high could extend trend", "price": 336.5},
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "signal": "Range-bound; add only on breakout >143.8", "reason": "Tight day, defended 141.6; needs push through intraday resistance to confirm strength", "price": 143.8},
    {"symbol": "WAAREEENER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Closed near day high on good volume; trigger above 3348 opens room higher", "price": 3348},
    {"symbol": "INDIANB", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "PSU banks led; strong wide-range up day; watch move through 761", "price": 761.05},
    {"symbol": "UNIONBANK", "signal": "Momentum continuation on dips", "reason": "Strong close near highs within trend; buy-the-dip zone 136–137 if strength holds", "price": 138.51},
    {"symbol": "SUNDARMFIN", "signal": "Momentum long bias on pullbacks", "reason": "Wide-range bullish day; consider around 4300–4350 if market tone supportive", "price": 4411.5},
    {"symbol": "DELHIVERY", "signal": "Range breakout setup", "reason": "Closed near highs; trigger above 454 for continuation", "price": 453.9},
    {"symbol": "NAVINFLUOR", "signal": "Bullish reversal; breakout watch", "reason": "Strong green candle; clearing 4635 would confirm upside", "price": 4635},
    {"symbol": "BEML", "signal": "Trend continuation watch", "reason": "Defence basket strength; push through 4213 can extend move", "price": 4212.9},
    {"symbol": "KPITTECH", "signal": "Caution/Avoid unless >1120", "reason": "Sharp selloff and large intraday range; needs reclaim of 1120 to reduce downside risk", "price": 1120},
    {"symbol": "CUMMINSIND", "signal": "Wait for strength >3975", "reason": "Sold off from open-high; reclaiming 3975/4000 would negate weakness", "price": 3975},
    {"symbol": "DIXON", "signal": "Volatility alert; strength only above 16835", "reason": "Very wide range; safer entry on breakout or after base near 16000–16100", "price": 16835},
    {"symbol": "AEGISLOG", "signal": "Momentum continuation above 773", "reason": "Strong close and volume; clearing 773 would confirm", "price": 773},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Support retest around 1450", "reason": "Pullback towards prior support; look for reversal signal while >1450", "price": 1450}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 4140,
    "total_value": 25657.3,
    "holdings_count": 2,
    "holdings": [
      "ASHOKLEY: 70 units @ ₹142.00 (C ₹142.67)",
      "HINDCOPPER: 35 units @ ₹312.00 (C ₹329.44)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU banks leadership: INDIANB and UNIONBANK printed strong up candles; track weekly closes for follow-through.",
    "Metals bid: HINDCOPPER strong with volume; JINDALSTEL also firm—watch sector momentum into next week.",
    "Renewables diverged: WAAREEENER strong breakout setup; KPIGREEN muted—prefer relative strength names.",
    "IT mixed-to-weak: KPITTECH heavy selloff; PERSISTENT/MPHASIS soft, COFORGE comparatively resilient.",
    "Capital goods saw profit-taking: CUMMINSIND sold from open-high; ABB/ABBOTINDIA/Page faced pressure—avoid fresh longs until reversal signals.",
    "Defence complex constructive: BEML, GRSE, HAL firm—trend continuation setups on strength.",
    "Logistics steady: DELHIVERY and AEGISLOG constructive; IRCTC still range-bound (watch >705).",
    "Consumer retail cooling: TRENT eased; monitor 4666 support. Page weak—wait for base.",
    "Healthcare mixed: LUPIN/ZYDUSLIFE soft; METROPOLIS/ASTERSDM firmer—focus on relative strength.",
    "Electronics mfg volatile: DIXON wide-range day; AMBER and KAYNES also choppy—use levels, reduce position size if trading.",
    "CDSL approaching 1450 support—look for a higher low before considering entries.",
    "ASHOKLEY needs push through 143.8; hold bias while above 141.6.",
    "HINDCOPPER: watch 336.5–340 zone for breakout; ideal add-on pullbacks to 322–324 if momentum persists.",
    "Set weekend alerts at listed triggers; reassess weekly trends before placing any orders next week."
  ]
}
